messages.subject: Spring 2004
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, (I was going to send this offlist but it wouldn t go) I am having a bit of conference envy with all the reviews and excitement at
messages.messageBody:
Sandra,

(I was going to send this offlist but it wouldn't go)

I am having a bit of "conference envy" with all the reviews and
excitement at unschoolingdiscussion.com.



I have a vague memory of you mentioning being in the Cincinnati or Ohio
area in Spring of 2004. Is that something that may still happen? If
so, I would be happy to be part of planning and working out a day
program, or speaking time or anything. There seems to be a growing
interest in our area lately. Or maybe I just notice it more since I
have "come out of the closet" about my unschooling family life.



I could be mistaken about this...my list time has been sporadic in
recent months..too much life to live with four children :-)

Thanks,

Susan





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
